DOC.brief_summary: This 39-week, active controlled, study is designed to assess long-term efficacy, safety and tolerability of lumiracoxib 100mg od in patients with osteoarthritis (OA) of the knee who participated in the 13-week core CCOX189A2361 study.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Lumiracoxib in Patients With Primary Knee Osteoarthritis (OA)
DOC.criteria: Any patient who completed the core study 2361 may enter the extension trial upon signing informed consent. A patient is defined as completing if he/she completed the core study 2361 up to and including Visit 6 (week 13) without a major protocol violation. Those patients for whom continued treatment in the extension study is not considered appropriate by the treating physician Those patients who were noncompliant or who demonstrated a major protocol violation in the core study. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
